amendment.description: To strengthen America's military, to repeal the extension of tax rates for capital gains and dividends, to reduce the deficit, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 2737 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 2707.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2737.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2737 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 8.
Amendment SA 2737 ruled out of order by the chair.
